comments.body:
```suggestion

TASTy files contain the full typed tree of a class including source positions and documentation. This is ideal for tools that analyze or extract semantic information of the code. To avoid the hassle of working directly with the TASTy file we provide the `TastyConsumer` which loads the contents and exposes it through the TASTy reflect API.

```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@
## Inspecting TASTy files

To inspect the TASTy Reflect trees of a TASTy file a consumer can be defined in
the following way.
